languages.text: Вы можете ускорить действия врагов. Удерживайте [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] во время хода противника — и бой пойдет быстрее.
To {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} up enemies' actions, hold [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.
languages.original_text: Вы можете ускорить действия врагов. Удерживайте [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] во время хода противника — и бой пойдет быстрее.

traits.locale_text: To speed up enemies' actions, press [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their turn to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.
To speed up enemies' actions, press [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their turn to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.
To {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} up enemies' actions, hold [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.
To {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} up enemies' actions, hold [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.
To {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} up enemies' actions, press [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.

languages.text: 在敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，您可以按住{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}来加快敌人的行动，让战斗以更快的速度进行。{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}{/g}
languages.original_text: To {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} up enemies' actions, hold [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.

traits.locale_text: 在敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，您可以按住{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}来加快敌人的行动，让战斗以更快的速度进行。{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}{/g}

languages.text: 敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に[{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}]を長押しすると、敵のアクションが{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}スピード{/g}アップし高速で戦闘を進めることができる。
languages.original_text: To {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} up enemies' actions, hold [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.

traits.locale_text: 敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}を長押しすると、敵のアクションが{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}スピード{/g}アップし高速で戦闘を進めることができる。

languages.text: Para {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}acelerar{/g} las acciones de los enemigos, mantén [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] durante su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} para que el combate vaya más rápido.
languages.original_text: To {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} up enemies' actions, hold [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.

traits.locale_text: Para {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}acelerar{/g} las acciones de los enemigos, mantén [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] durante su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} para que el combate vaya más rápido.

languages.text: Um die {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g} feindlicher Aktionen zu erhöhen, halte während ihres {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}], um den Kampf zu beschleunigen.
languages.original_text: To {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} up enemies' actions, hold [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.

traits.locale_text: Um die {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g} feindlicher Aktionen zu erhöhen, halte während ihres {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}], um den Kampf zu beschleunigen.

languages.text: Pour {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}accélérer{/g} les actions des ennemis, appuyez longuement sur [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] pendant leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} afin de permettre un déroulement plus rapide du combat.
languages.original_text: To {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} up enemies' actions, hold [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.

traits.locale_text: Pour {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}accélérer{/g} les actions des ennemis, appuyez longuement sur [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] pendant leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} afin de permettre un déroulement plus rapide du combat.

languages.text: Düşmanların eylemlerini {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}hızlandırmak{/g} için, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} onlara geldiğinde [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] düğmesini basılı tutarak çatışmanın ilerleme hızını artır.
languages.original_text: To {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} up enemies' actions, hold [{bind|SpeedUpEnemies}] during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to make the battle proceed at a faster pace.
